EmailTemplate.name: Agile Accelerator UAT Release Notifications
EmailTemplate.subject: UAT release is approaching {!agf__ADM_Build__c.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Dear, UAT release is approaching {!agf__ADM_Build__c.Name}. Please complete design documentation and necessary reviews and create Configuration Workbook and start communication with RM team. {!agf__ADM_Build__c.Link} -- RM team
